basic.description:
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36S;84P)
RECOMMENDATION    (BIOL 301/3.0 or BIOL 341/3.0) and BIOL 322/3.0.
basic.subject: BIOL
basic.title: Biochemical Adaptations to Life Under Extreme Conditions

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Recommendation    BIOL341 and BIOL322.
Prerequisites     BIOL334 or BIOL234 or (BCHM315 and BCHM316) or BCHM 310.
